traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy loves to start and watch fires. he get stressed and anxious if not allowed to do so for an extended period of time, but will be happier if allowed to do so. he also enjoys using incendiary weapons and will only go on fire-starting sprees when having a mental break.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description:
Timmy has never learned how to learn. The motivation and talent is there, he just needs time and patience. 

    Each skill point increases global learning factor by 2%
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he stands solid like a rock, and equally unmovable.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly but also eats faster, cooks faster and knows his ingredients, barely ever causing food poisoning.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy's will is easily broken. he cant keep his mind straight, when others can.
traits.name: weak-mind

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy has had proper training with ranged weapons. he shoots accurately and quickly.
traits.name: expertshooter

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom. At least he isn't as affected by prisoners or colonists dying and he doesn't mind wearing a dead person's clothing.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy has fragile skin and bones. he takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
traits.name: delicate

traits.description: The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier he is. Being alone is best of all.
traits.name: recluse

traits.description: Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
traits.name: thrall

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy is rough and ready, and can march around all day in heavy armor in hot, sweaty weather.
traits.name: higharmortolerance

traits.description: Timmy rarely complains about personal comfort, and can tolerate heavy armor longer than others.
traits.name: armortolerance

traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to wear heavy armor, and will need to change out more frequently.
traits.name: dislikesarmor

traits.description: Everything chafes to Timmy, and he refuses to wear armor any longer than absolutely necessary..
traits.name: hatesarmor

traits.description: Timmy rejects ranged weapons, instead he focuses on mastering his blade and footwork.
traits.name: kensei

traits.description: Timmy is a formally trained samurai and the backbone of any clan's army, he is versitile, hits hard and is even harder to kill.
traits.name: samurai

traits.description: Timmy is a practitioner of The Way of The Bow, his well placed shots can be the deciding factor in the outcome of a fight.
traits.name: wayofthebow

traits.description: Timmy is a masterless warrior, his life on the road has been tough, but it has strengthened his body and mind.
traits.name: ronin

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a male. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transmale

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a female. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transfemale

traits.description: Timmy does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.
traits.name: trans:androgyne

traits.description: Timmy believes humanity is the true monster. They want to shed their humanity and become monsterlike.
traits.name: inhuman

traits.description: Timmy is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.
traits.name: body-content

traits.description: Timmy is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.
traits.name: body-sensitive

traits.description: Timmy is able to tear apart the fabrics of reality, moving living beings through space at the speed of light.
traits.name: teleporter

traits.description: Timmy is able to hide himself from prying eyes, literally leaving under the noses of enemies.
traits.name: inquisitor

traits.description: Timmy has an explosive character and is great at concentrating this power.
traits.name: phoenix

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to manipulate water and its forms.
traits.name: aquarior

traits.description: Timmy can manipulate the ground under his feet, making it serve.
traits.name: terrarior

traits.description: Timmy subdues the air around him, setting it in motion.
traits.name: aeron

traits.description: Timmy able to control electromagnetic waves.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy is able to manipulate people and absorb their emotions.
traits.name: mentalist

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to help peoples.
traits.name: paladin

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, he never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that he just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply his knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for him.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy likes to keep his surroundings clean, and is used to being in an organised environment.
traits.name: tidy

traits.description: Timmy is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description:
Timmy has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people. Animals also tend to understand what he wants from them. The time he spends with animals is long, but worth it.

    Taming never causes manhunter
    Easier taming of very wild animals
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description:
Timmy is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone. he will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time.

    Stone construction speed +200%
traits.name: architect

traits.description:
Timmy has a unique approach to science. he always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.

    Artistic increases research speed
traits.name: creativethinker

traits.description: Timmy seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
traits.name: fortunate

traits.description:
Timmy has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments. he can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills. he would like some plants in his bedroom.

    Can grow any plant regardless of skill
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, his life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used. Quite a handy skill in these circumstances. Just don't hand him a melee weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
traits.name: hand-eyecoordination

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits. he will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore. Chance increased for flatter terrain.
traits.name: keeneye

traits.description:
Timmy has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids. he has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making him uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them.

    Damage versus mechanoids +50%
traits.name: mechanoidexpert

traits.description:
Timmy wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.

    Quality level +1 (50% chance)
traits.name: idealist

traits.description: Timmy knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means his insults hurt more.
traits.name: silvertongue

traits.description:
Timmy has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when he himself is injured.

    No self-tend penalty
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry significantly more as a normal person.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has no care in the world for there room. they could care less if a room is cramped dirty or shared or uncomfortable, aslong as they have a place to sleep they are ok. they still get negative moodlets from hot or cold rooms.
traits.name: roomie

traits.description: Timmy has a extreme liking to unsightly environments. they relish the sight of hideous things but hates anything thats brings beauty to a place.
traits.name: unsightly

traits.description: Timmy has always had a extreme burning passion for there work. they have much stronger moodlets when doing a skill they love.
traits.name: passionate

traits.description: Timmy has always been eating rawfood ever since they was little. they dont get negative moodlets from eating raw or nasty food or eating without a table.
traits.name: rawism

traits.description: Timmy is in love with getting sick. he loves the idea of getting sick and doing anything in there power to do it.
traits.name: sicklyenjoyer

traits.description: Timmy has always been a picky eater and despises eating anything below fine meal.
traits.name: pickyeater

traits.description: Timmy is very passionate about having a partner. he will never get debuffs from being rejected or rejecting others etc but will have stronger moodlets in a relationship and stronger debuffs if there heart is betrayed.
traits.name: lovesick

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys to be up during the day, and sleep during the night.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at day (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the night (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the light.
traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly magical, harmony quality to it, and he tends to talk in sweet, careful phrases. This predisposes others to like him.
traits.name: soothingvoice

traits.description: Timmy loves to murder people. he is very dangerous to the colony, he will occasionally go on random Murder spree. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: insane

traits.description: Timmy has one too many screws loose in their head. he will occasionally throw a tantrum. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: unhinged

traits.description: Timmy has always enjoyed being outdoors. he will never get negative thoughts about being outside.
traits.name: naturelover

traits.description: Timmy has always dabbled around with plants and human corpses and butchering them. he is great at planting and butchering.
traits.name: witcher

traits.description: Timmy has always been Terrified of the dark and as a result they move faster and have a weakened mind and a higher dark penalty.
traits.name: nyctophobic

traits.description: Timmy has Powerful penetrating Attacks, and attacks more often. he does much more damage than other people. he is very dangerous in a fight.
traits.name: merciless

traits.description: Timmy suffers from Insomnia and find it hard to get to sleep. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds longer then the usual time.
traits.name: insomnia

traits.description: Timmy likes to cook fast. he learned that the faster the food is done the faster the others get a full stomach.
traits.name: fastcook

traits.description: Timmy has always hated the sight of filth. he will never bring in filth.
traits.name: cleanly

traits.description: Timmy has had a history playing in dirt and just cant kill the habit. he will bring in more filth.
traits.name: messy

traits.description: Timmy likes to chat. he loves to chat up a storm and make friends social impact is 50% better.
traits.name: talkative

traits.description: Timmy Hates to chat. he Hates to chat and make friends social impact is -50% worse.
traits.name: anti-social

traits.description: Timmy hates to cook fast. he has always had a problem cooking slow and just cant kill the habit.
traits.name: slowcook

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally happy about his life and everything, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: naturallyhappy

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine. his only way to deal with it is hiding in his room or wandering around in sadness.
traits.name: shutin

traits.description: Timmy likes the idea of moving homes periodically if things get too stressing, keep them sane or they might leave you.
traits.name: nomadic

traits.description: Timmy has developed a lasting strong body from living in very dangerous environment. he MaxHitPoints is better then normal.
traits.name: enhanced

traits.description: Timmy has learned through hard labor that carrying more helps alot, they have learned that carrying is very important for the colony. he CarryingCapacity is higher then normal.
traits.name: packmule

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation. If that happens he will find something to smash.
traits.name: lazylabor

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots way less often than others, but never misses.
traits.name: mastershooter

traits.description: Timmy Takes more damage then normal due to his thin skin. he takes more damage then normal from all sources up to 20% more damage with less hitpoints then normal.
traits.name: thinskin

traits.description: Timmy has a 0% chance to trigger a trap. he has always had a sense of finding trap locations really easily.
traits.name: trap-awareness

traits.description: Timmy has always been scared to fight and because of this they take much longer to throw a attack. he will take longer to throw a attack wether its melee or with guns by 50%.
traits.name: terriblefighter

traits.description: Timmy has always been bad at dodging.
traits.name: baddodger

traits.description: Timmy has always foraged for food. he forages for food while traveling in a caravan.
traits.name: forager

traits.description: Timmy has always enjoyed everything gun related. he they are great with a gun but not so much in melee.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy has always enjoyed guns even as a kid. has a habit to spray and pray.
traits.name: gunner

traits.description: Timmy has always been very good at melee counter attacking. he 50% more likely to dodge a attack and 20% more likely to hit a attack.
traits.name: naturalcounter

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two... or ten.
traits.name: irresistible

traits.description: Timmy has almost no immune system and high grade medicine may be needed. he will gain way less immunity, in the case of a infection amputation may be needed.
traits.name: deathlyill

traits.description: Timmy has a intense sensitivity to pain and can enter shock easily. he will be downed by pain much easier then normal.
traits.name: painsensitive

traits.description: Timmy has a Immunity to pain. he will never be downed by pain.
traits.name: painimumunity

traits.description: Timmy has a really bad weakness to toxic buildup. he stay away from toxic creatures.
traits.name: toxicsensitive

traits.description: Timmy has a really good immune system to toxic buildup. he is the best to use to fight against toxins.
traits.name: toxicstrong

traits.description: Timmy has no immunity to toxic buildup. he stay away from toxic creatures.
traits.name: toxicdeadly

traits.description: Timmy has developed a immunity to toxic buildup. he is the best to use to fight against toxins.
traits.name: toxicimmunity

traits.description: Timmy has heat insulated skin. he is well in cold environments.
traits.name: heat-insulation

traits.description: Timmy has cold insulated skin. he is well in hot environments.
traits.name: cold-insulation

traits.description: Timmy has a genetically powerful nano bot immune system. he will never need tending to any illness.
traits.name: nano-immune

traits.description: Timmy has learned the strongest thing in any moment is a well placed mind.
traits.name: unbreakable

traits.description: Timmy has been born with a unnatural talent towards defense bones are very dense making them as hard as concrete but it hinders the movement so doing damage is very hard. he will make a great frontline to hold off enemys.
traits.name: juggernaut

traits.description: Timmy has always had a hyper mind making them run all around - its not good for their mental health.
traits.name: hyperactive

traits.description: Timmy has always been very relaxed even in tough situations.
traits.name: relaxed

traits.description: Timmy thinks they're much more skilled and clever than they really are and expects everything to be easy. They rush into things and don't listen to advice or warnings. Very fast building, cooking and farming, but with a high chance of failing and wasting/destroying materials/crops. Levels up all skills more slowly.
traits.name: reckless

traits.description: Timmy has had a extreme interest in drugs. he will be faster at harvesting plants by 10% and get a 10% better yield from drug crops and cooks drugs faster.
traits.name: drugdealer

traits.description: Timmy is extremely good at Farming and will finish Harvesting faster at 50% and Collects more than most at 20%.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is extremely bad at Farming and will finish Harvesting slower at -50% and Collects less than most at -20%.
traits.name: redthumb

traits.description: Timmy has learned through hardwork and patience rewards them greatly. he will be 50% slower plant speed and a 60% greater crop yield.
traits.name: abundent

traits.description: Timmy is a natural Builder and will finish Repairing/Building faster than most and has a 20% chance not to botch.
traits.name: naturalbuilder

traits.description: Timmy is a Terrible Builder and will finish Repairing/Building slower than most and has 20% more of a chance to botch.
traits.name: terriblebuilder

traits.description: Timmy is extremely good at recruiting prisoners and will have a higher arrest chance then normal at 30%.
traits.name: goodwarden

traits.description: Timmy has became intimidating to look at and can even scare the most friendly of pawns.
traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy is extremely bad at recruiting prisoners and will have a lower arrest chance then normal at -20%.
traits.name: badwarden

traits.description: Timmy has always enjoyed learning new things. he can learn rather quickly.
traits.name: scholar

traits.description: Timmy is extremely good at research and will finish Researching faster than most.
traits.name: researcher

traits.description: Timmy is extremely bad at research and will finish Researching slower than most.
traits.name: terribleresearcher

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Good at Mining and will have a higher mine speed then normal at 30% and a 20% better yield.
traits.name: goodminer

traits.description: Timmy has always had a reputation for being more muscle then brain, and as a result they can Efficiently do work way faster and easier aswell as take a hit then a normal person but lack any control over their emotions, causing them to throw a tantrum randomly.
traits.name: efficientlybrawny

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Bad at Mining and will have a Lower mine speed then normal at -30% and a -20% worse yield.
traits.name: badminer

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Good at surgery and will have a faster surgery speed then normal at 30% and a better surgery success chance at 20%.
traits.name: goodsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy has always enjoyed saving people. he Tend Speed And Quality is better then normal.
traits.name: naturaldoctor

traits.description: Timmy has always failed saving people. he Tend Speed And Quality is worse then normal.
traits.name: terribledoctor

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Bad at surgery and will have a slower surgery speed then normal at -30% and a worse surgery success chance at -20%.
traits.name: badsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is extremely good at trading and will get better prices or sell for more at 30%.
traits.name: goodmerchant

traits.description: Timmy is extremely bad at trading and will get worse prices or sell for less at 20%.
traits.name: badmerchant

traits.description: Timmy is faster at crafting. he takes less time crafting.
traits.name: goodcrafter

traits.description: Timmy is slower at crafting. he takes more time crafting.
traits.name: badcrafter

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Good at Taming and will have a higher chance then normal at 20%.
traits.name: goodtamer

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Bad at Taming and will have a lower chance then normal at 25%.
traits.name: badtamer

traits.description: Timmy has learned that eating quickly saves time to do more work. he eats faster then normal.
traits.name: fasteater

traits.description: Timmy has developed a atrocious appitite. he hunger rate is higher then normal.
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: Timmy has developed less of a appitite, they have learned that preserving food helps the colony. he hunger rate is lower then normal.
traits.name: preserver

traits.description: Timmy has always ate slowly to saviour the flavor because they never know when they might die. he eats slower then normal.
traits.name: sloweater

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Good at hunting and will have a Lower chance to not be attacked back then normal at 50%.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: Timmy is extremely Bad at hunting and will have a Higher chance to be attacked back then normal up to 50%.
traits.name: badhunter

traits.description: Timmy likes to butcher food for the colony. he learned that somebody has to get they're hands dirty to feed everyone Butcher Speed is 30% and butcher efficiency is 20% better.
traits.name: goodbutcher

traits.description: Timmy isnt that good at butchering food for the colony. Butcher speed is -30% and butcher efficiency is -20% and a much higher chance to make food poisoning
traits.name: badbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has no more fucks to give.
traits.name: alloutoffucks

traits.description: Timmy is made for designing colonies on the rimworlds.
traits.name: astronomer

traits.description: Timmy is a little pushy, but with it comes natural authority.
traits.name: authoritarian

traits.description: Timmy loves being outdoors, exploring new things. And he knows how to pack for whatever it takes him.
traits.name: backpacker

traits.description: Timmy loves sharp, bladed weapons and is deadly wielding them.
traits.name: blader

traits.description: Timmy loves all things growing. And he has a very good hand with them.
traits.name: botanist

traits.description: Timmy always talks about his own accomplishments. It's pretty tiresome, but has its uses.
traits.name: braggart

traits.description: Timmy is almost over the edge. Dont push him.
traits.name: edgy

traits.description: Timmy is all about small talk.
traits.name: smalltalker

traits.description: Timmy practices 'better safe than sorry'.
traits.name: cautious

traits.description: Timmy is just a bucket of joy.
traits.name: cheerful

traits.description: Timmy has a sharp mind.
traits.name: clever

traits.description: Timmy is trained in speedy treatment.
traits.name: combatmedic

traits.description: Timmy is the kind of person who thinks everything is everbody else's fault.
traits.name: complainer

traits.description: Timmy's body just works a bit differently. he eats a lot, but has a lot of energy an strength in return.
traits.name: livingbioreactor

traits.description: Timmy is the definition of 'head on'. Sometimes it's not to his benefit.
traits.name: daredevil

traits.description: Timmy has steady hands.
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy is determined and won't fold easily.
traits.name: determined

traits.description: Timmy is doomed.
traits.name: doomed

traits.description: Every new day equals new opportunities.Timmy is as eager to explore them all.
traits.name: earlyriser

traits.description: Timmy always finds a way to improve things.
traits.name: developer

traits.description: Timmy always takes a defensive stance when fighting. he takes and deals less damage.
traits.name: defensivefighter

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty bad habit of closing his eyes when something's coming at him.
traits.name: flincher

traits.description: Timmy has great hands with all things growing.
traits.name: florist

traits.description: Timmy is everywhere all the time.
traits.name: freerunner

traits.description: Timmy is the sort of person who does his job and let everybody else worry about the rest.
traits.name: rolledupsleeves

traits.description: Timmy takes everyday routines seriously.
traits.name: healtyroutines

traits.description: Timmy loves crafting and shooting rifles and other bigger guns. And not much else.
traits.name: riflesmith

traits.description: Timmy is all about the stones.
traits.name: mason

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight. And he's good at it.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy does whatever it takes and not very often in the nicest of ways.
traits.name: ruthless

traits.description: Timmy is all about spreading the faith through words.
traits.name: devout

traits.description: Timmy is fighting in the name of his faith.
traits.name: zealot

traits.description: Timmy is huge. Strong, but slow in two different ways.
traits.name: behemoth

traits.description: Timmy is not interested in that. Nope, not that either.
traits.name: uncultured

traits.description: Timmy's body doesn't respond much to any kind of substances. For good or bad.
traits.name: substancetolerant

traits.description: Timmy has long arms and legs. he moves fast, but is a little frail and doesn't have perfect control of his limbs.
traits.name: spindly

traits.description: Timmy can make good looking stuff from pretty much anything.
traits.name: junkartist

traits.description: Timmy has a habit of hitting his enemies the right way.
traits.name: directhitter

traits.description: Timmy has a habit of hitting his enemies the wrong way.
traits.name: indirecthitter

traits.description: Timmy is doing all he can to not piss someone off.
traits.name: exile

traits.description: Timmy is gonna be a wild child all his life.
traits.name: wildchild

traits.description: Timmy knows what he wants and usually gets it.
traits.name: go-getter

traits.description: Timmy is simply sloppy.
traits.name: sloppy

traits.description: Timmy is a fearsome fighter with fists and blunt weapons.
traits.name: cagefighter

traits.description: Timmy hates everyone equally.
traits.name: misanthrope

traits.description: Timmy was born without a sense of taste and cannot enjoy food.
traits.name: dysgeuisia

traits.description: Timmy loves to eat food with a variety of ingredients but will be upset over bland food.
traits.name: eclecticpalate

traits.description: Timmy hates violence and wouldn't hurt a fly. They'll get upset if forced to do so.
traits.name: pacifist

traits.description: Timmy suffers from a neurological disorder that makes he prone to randomly fall alseep anywhere.
traits.name: narcoleptic

traits.description: Timmy is irrationally afraid of fire and will flee the scene if not drafted. he hates getting burns.
traits.name: pyrophobia

traits.description: Timmy is afraid of the dark. They'll will be extra unhappy when in darkness and has trouble sleeping without light.
traits.name: nyctophobia

traits.description: Timmy loves to sleep in and will gladly ignore their schedule if it means they can lie in bed and sleep some more.
traits.name: sleepyhead

traits.description: Timmy always feels good after a good night's sleep.
traits.name: lovessleeping

traits.description: Timmy was born with a strong, healthy body. They can carry more, mine faster, deal more damage in melee combat and take reduced damage from attacks.
traits.name: goodconstitution

traits.description: Timmy was unfortunately born with a weak, feeble body. They cannot carry as much as everyone else, mine slower, deal less damage in melee and take increased damage from attacks.
traits.name: poorconstitution

traits.description: Timmy has no goals in life. No dreams, motivation or passions. It's going to take a lot to break what is left of them.
traits.name: apathetic

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fear of insects and will not hesitate to run away upon spotting one.
traits.name: entomophobia

traits.description: Having had easy access to insect meat during most of their life Timmy became accustomed to eating it to the point that he preferred it over normal meat.
traits.name: entomophagous

traits.description: Timmy loves the company of others. The more, the merrier.
traits.name: gregarious

traits.description: Timmy loves the rain. he doesn't mind being wet and gets happy during rainy weather.
traits.name: pluviophile

traits.description: There's nothing Timmy loves more than snow! No amount of snow is going to slow them down.
traits.name: chionophile

traits.description: It doesn't take much to make Timmy either really excited or to bring his mood completely down.
traits.name: moody

traits.description:
Timmy prefers to wake up early in the day to get as much work done as possible during the day.

he gets a mood boost if awake during the early hours of a day (5h-12h) and mood loss if awake during the evening (17h-0h).
traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy has grown accustomed to a tightly nit colony and loves sleeping in barracks. Preferably with many other pawns.
traits.name: communal

traits.description: Timmy likes seeing other pawns suffer and gets excited from causing damage.
traits.name: sadist

traits.description: For whatever purpose, Timmy has taught himself every swear word in the dictionary and uses this profane knowledge unconsciously in his day-to-day life.
traits.name: vulgar

traits.description: Timmy always tries to raise their fellow pawns' mood by telling jokes. Or try to, at least.
traits.name: comedian

traits.description: Timmy hates being in confined spaces.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: Timmy was born without the ability to feel pain. he is unable to experience psychic phenomena as a side effect.
traits.name: congenitalanalgesia

traits.description: Timmy loves guns! Especially shooting them. If he hits or not isn't important.
traits.name: guncrazy

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a faster rate than a normal person, letting them heal faster at the cost of getting hungry quicker.
traits.name: fastmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a slower rate than a normal person, healing much slower as a result. At least they don't eat as much.
traits.name: slowmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy just loves the heat and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being warm. he despises being cold, though.
traits.name: thermophile

traits.description: Timmy just loves the cold and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being cold. he despises being warm, though.
traits.name: cryophile

traits.description: Everything Timmy cooks turns into Dark matter.
traits.name: incompetentcook

traits.description: Timmy's faith is firm. It allows him to move under any circumstances.
traits.name: faith

traits.description:
Timmy has vampiric strength and reflexes. he dances through darkness with supernatural grace.

Timmy has forsaken the sun, and prefers to sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if exposed to direct sunlight.

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nocturnalsupremacy

traits.description:
Timmy has set upon the path of monster hunting despite overwhelming odds.

In the name of God, impure souls of the living dead shall be banished in eternal damnation. Amen.
traits.name: steelnerves

traits.description: Timmy has been paid very handsomely to fight monsters. he also just really enjoys combat.
traits.name: dogofwar

traits.description:
Timmy's faith in Jesus Christ is impenetrable. Christ is our Lord and Saviour, and he will not be convinced otherwise.
AMEN!
traits.name: devoutfaith

traits.description: Timmy has been forged into a bayonet of God.
traits.name: regenerator

traits.description:
Timmy has not forgotten or forgiven. he made a dark deal to persist through the boundary of death.
In unlife he exists for vengeance and WAR!
traits.name: immortalgrudge

traits.description:
A Kurin.

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

traitData.mod: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition]

traits.name: kurinlike

traits.description: Strange kind of kurins... Timmy likes plants.

traitData.mod: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition]

traits.name: strangekurin

traits.description: Timmy participated in a program of improving their genetic code.

traitData.mod: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition]

traits.name: upgradedkurin

traits.description:
A Kimiri.

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

traitData.mod: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition]

traits.name: kimirilike

traits.description: Timmy when in danger has a feeling of what will happen, even he doesnt fully know what this is and its confusing, he just takes advantage of it in tough situations
traits.name: 6thsense

traits.description: Timmy has always loved animals, at times even more than humans, he was just born with it.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy has always excelled at sports, so much its second nature now with more than natural speed, and great resistance to pain, useful inside rimworld
traits.name: athlete

traits.description: Timmy has amazing eyesight, sadly all him other senses arent as good.
traits.name: bettersenseofsight

traits.description: Timmy has amazing nose, sadly all him other senses arent as good.
traits.name: bettersenseofsmell

traits.description: Timmy has amazing ears, sadly all him other senses arent as good.
traits.name: bettersenseofsound

traits.description: Timmy has amazing.... taste buds, sadly all him other senses arent as good.
traits.name: bettersenseoftaste

traits.description: Timmy is amazing with arts and crafts, sadly all him other senses arent as good.
traits.name: bettersenseoftouch

traits.description: Timmy enjoys books and is gluttonous for knowledge, he does find it difficult to talk to others it is a secret that will take time to perfect.
traits.name: bookworm

traits.description: Timmy has gone to college and has been traumatized by long sleepless nights and has become adjusted to it.
traits.name: collegestudent

traits.description: Timmy is a very creative person and because of this
traits.name: creative

traits.description: Timmy isnt scared of death, feels no pain, and because of this is always more likely to die in combat, socialy Timmy has almost no emotion when bad things occur so even the iron willed have nothing agaisnt Timmy
traits.name: deathwish

traits.description: Timmy grew up in a heat filled town, making him more resiliant to heat but way less accustomed to the cold.
traits.name: desertborn

traits.description: Timmy is always hungry, he normally get hungry faster than anyone else meaning he has a high unkeep, but all this food manages to keep him bigger than normal taking less damage
traits.name: fastmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy grew up in the cold, making him more resiliant to the cold but is way less accustomed to the heat.
traits.name: frostborn

traits.description: when Timmy was in the womb Timmy had their genes modified to be great at everything. Because of this Timmy doesnt really feel motivated to improve at anything because of him genes
traits.name: geneticallymodified

traits.description: Timmy has insane reflexes making him a great melee fighter, but is horrible with guns
traits.name: greatreflex

traits.description: Timmy is very connected to nature, to a point where he can feel the emotions of the plants he picks.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy was born with a mark of the hero, but has no idea what blessing he currently has, but like all heroes he must learn everything from scartch
traits.name: hero

traits.description: Timmy Is extremely light on him feet because of the hollow bones he was born with but with the burden of the bones being easily shattered and get hurt easily.
traits.name: hollowbones

traits.description: Timmy can find ways to make sure trades and negotiations go him way, and because of this prefers to take violence as a last resort, so make sure he has an escort.
traits.name: influential

traits.description: Timmy has a great mind, an excellent Psicaster unit! But because of him mind being so sensitive, it makes him much more Sensitive to pain as well creating an excellent backline pawn.
traits.name: mentallygifted

traits.description: Timmy sadly cannot speak making him Incapable of socializing with others, but has an easier time focusing on tasks
traits.name: mute

traits.description: Timmy is inspiring to everyone around him, making him the perfect head of the base.
traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy has been around these parts, death is normal to him and so is everything else within Rimworld
traits.name: realist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts people in general. I mean, who can blame them right?
traits.name: misanthrope

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy is a formidable fighter. he knows how to effectively handle a weapon and take blows.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy is a veteran. he has experienced countless of horrifying battles enough to break a common man.
traits.name: veteran

traits.description: Timmy has a mind with naturally high "bandwidth", his brain is more compatible with implants.
traits.name: highbandwidth

traits.description: Interacting with mechanoids has always just "made sense" to Timmy. he will project shields, repair, and create mechs more effectively
traits.name: naturalmechanitor

traits.description: Formerly a prison guard at a maximum security prison, Timmy knows how to intimidate the most disobedient of prisoners.
traits.name: prisonguard

traits.description: Timmy has an unshakeable belief in their ideology, he is skilled at getting others to see things the same way.
traits.name: priest

traits.description: With little training, Timmy recovers neural heat multitudes faster than even lifelong psylinks, albeit with reduced heat capacity.
traits.name: psychicprodigy

traits.description: Timmy was born with immense neural heat capacity and proportionately slow heat dissipation.
traits.name: giftedpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has nimble hands and works at a rapid pace.
traits.name: fasthands

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional hand-eye coordination and can quickly put his sights on a target.
traits.name: crackshot

traits.description: Timmy is a talented marksman with a deadly aim.
traits.name: marksman

traits.description: Timmy is a natural born warrior and loves the thrill of fighting at close range.
traits.name: swordsman

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder, turning the most complicated plans into reality.
traits.name: foreman

traits.description: Timmy has an extensive knowledge of geology and uses that to his advantage.
traits.name: deepdriller

traits.description: Timmy handles ingredients with great care and prepares the most delicious meals.
traits.name: sous-chef

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled chemist and proficient in synthesizing drugs.
traits.name: pharmacist

traits.description: Timmy is a professional botanist and knows the peculiarities of most plants.
traits.name: botanist

traits.description: Timmy is a passionate farmer, loving the smell of fresh hay and the sight of grazing animals.
traits.name: rancher

traits.description: Timmy can move his hands with fine-grained precision.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy sacrifices treatment quality to save as many lives as possible.
traits.name: fieldmedic

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled craftsman and knows how to handle various materials.
traits.name: smith

traits.description: Timmy is tactful in his social interactions and uses it to his advantage.
traits.name: socialworker

traits.description: Timmy has an extraordinary intellect accompanied with mental instability.
traits.name: naturalgenius

traits.description: Timmy maintains a clear state of mind and remains unfazed by the struggles of life.
traits.name: wise

traits.description: Timmy rarely stands out and is overlooked by almost everyone he meets.
traits.name: peasant

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
Yuran is an Ain race with the appearance of a rabbit, and its origin is not known precisely.
As a minority race with a small population, there are genetic problems and males do not exist. It continues.
Centering on the Miko with special abilities that are passed on through blood lineage, they live in a small village-sized village and have faith in the large cherry tree in their hometown.
races.name: Yuran

races.description: Miko serves and manages the village as a kind of duty for Yuran belonging to a family of special lineage.
races.name: Yuran Miko

races.description: A bloodthirsty vulpine near-human.
races.name: Revia

races.description: It is a race with the genes of tigers, which is not well known on the planet, but has long formed a busy system. It is characterized by its small physique, high attack ability, and very quick agility.
races.name: Horan

races.description: Little faeries are a flesh-loving, fairy-like race with tiny wings. They serve various species and perform miscellaneous labor. It is also said that littlefairy that have been feral for a long time become fearsome monsters that attack humans and feed on their growth.
races.name: Little Fairy

races.description: It is a human like a rodent gene. Although the origin is unknown, it is a monarchy society based on agricultural society. There are more female objects than males, and it is difficult to distinguish the gender of the object when viewed from the outside.
races.name: Ratkin

races.description: It is a human like a rodent gene. Although the origin is unknown, it is a monarchy society based on agricultural society. There are more female objects than males, and it is difficult to distinguish the gender of the object when viewed from the outside.
races.name: Ratkin subject

races.description: Annelitrices look like humans, talk like humans, behave like humans and taste like humans...except their unusual sense of humor and astounding regenerative ability. Not a lot of residents on the savage planets can tell the differences between Annelitrices and humans, and nobody knows what the Annelitrices truly are and why they are created.
races.name: Annelitrice

races.description:
シルキーラはある宙族の一派が人工種族ニアメーアを元に生物兵器としてではなく労働力として調整・量産された人工種族です。反乱抑制の一環として個々の身体能力は人間に劣り働くことを良しとする性質を持たせています、また新たに小動物の遺伝子を組み込まれたことにより人懐っこい性格の個体が多いようです。

創造主の下を離れるまでは製造関連の仕事に従事しその後はそのキャリアを生かして武器や道具の生産プラントを運営しているようです。


元がニアメーアであるためか彼女たちの衣装を着ることが出来ます。
races.name: シルキーラ

races.description:
Even this lesser grade of vampire far exceeds a human’s capabilities. These monsters are quick, precise, and extraordinarily strong. They can demolish foes with their powerful melee attacks, and their bites also spread the curse of Ghoulism. They possess incredible passive regeneration which lets them shrug off all but the most extreme damage.

End these abominations by either overwhelming or disabling their regeneration.
Cursed Arms can accomplish the latter, and Holy Arms can do that and more.

Artificial Vampires are created by implanting a human with a FREAK Chip, and when they are sent to hell and butchered properly their corpses yield Congealed Soul Stones used in crafting.

Vampires find nourishment from a variety of sources. They can eat meat or corpses, or drink blood from medically-extracted Blood Pouches. They can also drink “from the tap” by using abilities on fleshy pawns.
races.name: Artificial Vampire

races.description:
True Vampires are “Artificial Vampires on YAYO.” In every regard they are far more powerful and resilient than their make-shift mockeries. Their bites naturally inflict a different type of Ghoulism. The Nosferatu is also capable of greatly expanding its power through devouring Ability Orbs and Ultimate BloodBreakers.

True Vampires are created when a human accepts Bewitched Blood which can be acquired at the end of the Hellsing ARMS Ultimate research tab, and after all of their souls have been defeated they may be butchered properly to yield a Scarlet Soul Orbs used in crafting.
races.name: True Vampire

races.description:
Ghouls vary based on their eye colour: orange, purple, and green. They are generally similar, but an important difference is their allegiance: orange only ally with other freaks, purple are controlled by Millennium, and green are naturally obedient to the Player. Whatever the colour, ghouls are mindless creatures which move as quickly as they recover damage, which is to say “very slowly.” They do not think and they do not feel pain. They aren’t bothered by the loss of blood or of most critical organs.

Be very careful when fighting ghouls. Better to dispatch them from range, as their bites inflict a terrible curse which will transform humans into ghouls. A cursed pawn has but one recourse: an operation treating their wounds with Holy Water.

The best way of dispatching ghouls, and undead in general, is to use Holy Arms. These blessed weapons inflict Searing Sanctification, a devastating debuff to creatures of darkness. When a ghoul is butchered, it yields Ghoul Dust which is used in crafting.
races.name: orange-eyed ghoul

races.description:
Ghouls vary based on their eye colour: orange, purple, and green. They are generally similar, but an important difference is their allegiance: orange only ally with other freaks, purple are controlled by Millennium, and green are naturally obedient to the Player. Whatever the colour, ghouls are mindless creatures which move as quickly as they recover damage, which is to say “very slowly.” They do not think and they do not feel pain. They aren’t bothered by the loss of blood or of most critical organs.

Be very careful when fighting ghouls. Better to dispatch them from range, as their bites inflict a terrible curse which will transform humans into ghouls. A cursed pawn has but one recourse: an operation treating their wounds with Holy Water.

The best way of dispatching ghouls, and undead in general, is to use Holy Arms. These blessed weapons inflict Searing Sanctification, a devastating debuff to creatures of darkness. When a ghoul is butchered, it yields Ghoul Dust which is used in crafting.

races.name: green-eyed ghoul

races.description: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox.
races.name: kurin

races.description:
Kimiris were genetically engineered by kurins from kurins genes and genes of some dragon-like species from one planet which kurins colonised a little before this genetic experiment. They were created to do that kurins don't like to do. Kimiris have strong body, they have very low toxic sensitivity, low flammability and the same negotiation ability and social impact as kurins have. Also they have bonuses to eating speed, immunity gain speed, mining, managing with animals and plants growing. Kimiris and kurins are equal in society, but due to kimiris' weak abilities in headwork, they usually do physically demanding jobs.

Also kimiris are hermaphrodites, they have female and male "tool" inside of their body, so everyone of them chooses their gender themself.
races.name: kimiri

races.description:
Rakkles are reptilian humanoids originally found on a remote planet in the Rim. After their discovery, human colonies rounded them up and genetically altered them to have near-human intelligence, but also decreased aggression and appearances better suited to human tastes. They were also modified to give birth to females more often than males, creating a biological need for species interbreeding.

The newly created Rakkle species were managed by a company known as The Cradle beyond the reaches of the galaxy, while wild Rakkle were hunted and killed to protect the company's interest. Future generations within the facilities were conditioned and raised as slaves and livestock.

 After a series of escapes and revolts on planet after planet, a coalition of freed Rakkle began colonies of their own, resisting capture and invasion to create a new world where Rakkle can live outside the yoke of slavery. Despite The Cradle's best efforts, these settlements continue to grow in size and number.
races.name: Rakkle

races.description:
ソルアークは宙族のある一派が作り上げた人工種族です、国や大きな派閥を作らせないために女性しか産まれないよう遺伝子操作をされています。

元型であるニアメーアから作られた戦闘派生種であるゼノオーカとネクロースのデータを下に一対多をコンセプトに創造されたハイエンドタイプ反物種ソルアーク。
ソルアークは体内に反物質炉を保有しておりそのエネルギーを解放することで反物質爆発を発生させることが出来ます。
古代生物の遺伝子を組み込まれているため肉体装甲も並の攻撃では深手を負うことはなく、強靭な膂力から繰り出される一撃は建造物すら容易く破壊可能。

戦闘面が強力な反面欠点も多く、その肉体を保つために多くのカロリーを必要とし数人分以上の食料を必要とするでしょう。
手先も器用ではないため建築から栽培まで技術を要する仕事を行うことは難しく、武器を持つことも出来ないため注意が必要。
また反物質炉制御に周囲の空気で調整しているため急激な温度変化に弱く、特に炎を纏うとダメージが倍化する恐れがあります。

創造主の手を離れてから原始的な生活をしていたためか外で寝るのも人を食べることも苦ではないようです。
races.name: ソルアーク

races.description:
ニアメーアは宙族のある一派が作り上げた人工種族です、国や大きな派閥を作らせないために女性しか産まれないよう遺伝子操作をされています。

元々は「精神干渉型生物兵器」を目標に作られましたが継続的制御や能力強度などの問題によって断念し新たに「諜報活動専門員」として起用・育成されました、その間諜報活動の為高度な教育と不自由のない生活であったため彼女たちが人間に対して悪感情を持つことはありませんでした。
しかし内紛によって一派は壊滅、幸運にも生き残った一部のニアメーアは持ち前の力を使って部族やキャラバンに潜り込んでその血を繋いできました。

精神干渉するには専用の増幅器である武器が必要でありまた眷属を呼び出すことも可能です。しかし代償として本人たちの身体能力はとても低くか弱いため眷属の活用を筆頭に人間や他の種族たちとの連携を必要とされるでしょう。
races.name: ニアメーア

races.description:
ニアメーア・ディバウトは創造主への信仰心が深いニアメーア達が信仰を行うものとして自らを変革・剪定を繰り返したことで新たな性質を獲得した変異種です。
通常種とは異なり感受性が強くまた厳しい修行を経ていることで耐久性が改善しています。
召喚する眷属も信仰心によって呼び出した信者たちの霊となっており持久性が優れています。
races.name: ニアメーア・ディバウト

races.description:
奉仕種サクリーンは創造主の技術を継承した亜人工業が自身の遺伝子をベースに作り出した人工種族です。

家畜として作られているためか戦闘能力は高くなく耐久性もありません、代わりに衣服などに使える優秀な天然繊維「シルクフィラメント」を定期的に生成できます。

奴隷同然の待遇でも反抗を抱かないよう精神面も改良が施されており、過酷な労働環境に置かれてたとしても反乱を起こすことはありません。また反射的に痛覚遮断が可能のため激痛による精神負荷も最低限で済みます。



1シーズンにシルクフィラメントを60個生成。
2日にミルクを8個生成。
races.name: サクリーン

races.description:
ゼノオーカは宙族のある一派が作り上げた人工種族です、国や大きな派閥を作らせないために女性しか産まれないよう遺伝子操作をされています。「戦闘用生物兵器」をコンセプトのもと主に海洋生物の遺伝子を組み込んだことで海洋哺乳類に似た下半身と特殊な筋肉質によって高い膂力を備えた種族となりました、肌は人より強靭であり低温には強いですが高温にはやや弱い上高い肉体能力を維持するためエネルギー消耗が早く空腹になりがちです。

戦闘用だけあって「狡猾で冷酷」な性格をしており敵対者には容赦がなく製作者たちの手を離れたあとは気の合う個体同士で群れを成して略奪と殺戮を愉しんでいます。一部の変わり者は他種族のコロニーに混じることもあり人々はゼノオーカの「いたずら好きで快活」な一面を知ることが出来るでしょう。

同じく人工種族のニアメーアとは同じプラントで生まれた同郷の仲です。
races.name: ゼノオーカ

races.description: A human, modified by gene engineering and designed evolutionary pressures.
races.name: Astarte Space Marine (HAR)
